description: In a butcher shop, two butchers stand behind a meat display case. One butcher, wearing an orange shirt and white apron, is speaking to a customer in a brown coat and hat. The customer's back is mostly to the viewer. The display case contains various cuts of meat, including what looks like ground meat with a price tag and several steak cuts. Two cuts of meat hang from the ceiling. The speaking butcher appears to be contemplating the value of his assistant, who is also wearing a white apron and purple shirt, holding a meat cleaver.
caption: “Well, I never thought about it before ... but I suppose I’d let the kid go for about $1.99 a pound.”

other_text.location: On the price tag in the meat display case
Bottom left corner of the panel
